name: Picking Up The Pieces
objective: Visit any area on your map with a loot category icon Loot 3 containers
reward: 1x Rattler III 80x Medium Ammo

name: Trash Into Treasure
objective: Obtain 6 Wires Obtain 1 Battery
reward: 1x Tactical Mk. 1 3x Adrenaline Shot

name: Clearer Skies
objective: Destroy 3 ARC enemies Get 3 ARC Alloy for Shani
reward: Hiker Backpack (Black Color) 3x Sterilized Bandage 1x Light Shield

name: Off The Radar
objective: In One Round Visit a Field Depot Repair the antenna on the roof of the Field Depot
reward: 2x Defibrillator

name: A Bad Feeling
objective: Find and search any ARC Probe or ARC Courier
reward: 10x Metal Parts 5x Steel Spring 5x Duct Tape

name: A Balanced Harvest
objective: In One Round Go to the Research & Administration building Locate Lab 1 on the upper floor above the reception Search for any traces of the agricultural research project
reward: 3x Advanced Mechanical Components 3x Medium Gun Parts 10x Steel Spring

name: A Better Use
objective: Request in a Supply Drop from a Call Station Loot a Supply Drop
reward: Extended Light Magazine I Compensator I Stable Stock I

name: A Lay Of The Land
objective: In One Round Reach the Jiangsu Warehouse Find the shipping notes in the foreman's office Locate the scanners on the upper floor of Control Tower A6 Deliver 1 LiDAR Scanners to Shani
reward: Dam Testing Annex Key 3x Zipline 2x Smoke Grenade

name: A Reveal in Ruins
objective: In One Round Search for an ESR Analyzer inside any pharmacy in Buried City Deliver the ESR Analyzer to Lance
reward: Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing) 1x Surge Shield Recharger

name: A Symbol Of Unification
objective: In One Round Reach the Formicai Outpost in Dam Battlegrounds Locate the flag at Formicai Outpost Hoist the flag on the small platform overlooking the Red Lake
reward: Aviator Outfit (Dusted Cream Color) 3x Mod Components 5x Duct Tape

name: A Warm Place To Rest
objective: Locate the Abandoned Highway Camp Search for any signs of survivors Follow the red markers Inspect the grave
reward: Radio Renegade Outfit (Goggles Variant) 3x Noisemaker 5x Blue Light Stick 1x Rosary

name: After Rain Comes
objective: Find the flooded solar panels nearby the Grandioso Apartments Repair the solar panels using 5 Wires and 2 Batteries
reward: 5x Blue Light Stick 3x Antiseptic 5x Durable Cloth

name: Back On Top
requiredLocation: Buried City, Spaceport, Dam Battlegrounds, The Blue Gate
objective: On The Blue Gate, mark the white lookout tower south of the Warehouse Complex On Dam Battlegrounds, mark the Pattern House On Spaceport, mark the South Trench Tower On Buried City, mark the building with the mural in the Buried Properties
reward: Renegade I Stable Stock III 80x Medium Ammo

name: Broken Monument
objective: In One Round Reach the hallowed grounds by the Scrap Yard Search for a compass near the broken-down vehicles Search for the video tape near the cylindrical containers Search for the old field rations in the Raider camp Deliver the First Wave Tape to Tian Wen Deliver First Wave Compass to Tian Wen Deliver First Wave Rations to Tian Wen
reward: Arpeggio I Compensator II 80x Medium Ammo

name: Building A Library
objective: In One Round Locate the Library in the City Center Find 1 romance book Find 1 detective book Find 1 adventure book
reward: Buried City Town Hall Key

name: Celeste's Journals
objective: In One Round Retrieve Celeste's Journals from the South Swamp Outpost Retrieve Celeste's Journals from the northern outpost overlooking the Red Lakes Deliver 2 Journals to Celeste
reward: 1x Magnetic Accelerator 3x Heavy Gun Parts 1x Exodus Modules

name: Communication Hideout
objective: In One Round Reach the Red Tower in Old Town Find missing battery cell Install the battery cell in the Generator Enable the power on the Generator Boot the antenna terminal near the Red Tower
reward: Aviator Outfit (Crimson Racer Color) Anvil III 40x Heavy Ammo

name: Digging Up Dirt
objective: Locate the Santa Maria Houses in Old Town Locate the Dead Drop inside the courtyard
reward: x2 Advanced Electrical Components x4 Speaker Component

name: Doctor's Orders
objective: Obtain 1 Syringe Obtain 2 Antiseptic Obtain 1 Durable Cloth Obtain 1 Great Mullein
reward: 3x Adrenaline Shot 3x Sterilized Bandage 1x Surge Shield Recharger

name: Down To Earth
objective: In One Round Visit a Field Depot Deliver a Field Crate to a Supply Station Collect the reward
reward: Combat Mk. 1 Medium Shield

name: Echoes Of Victory Ridge
objective: In One Round Reach Victory Ridge Retrieve the battle plans from the hideout under the broken highway Deliver Major Aiva's Patch to Celeste
reward: 6x Crude Explosives 2x Processor 1x Music Box

name: Eyes On The Prize
objective: Find the secluded roof terrace south-west of the Southern Station, look for blue tarps. Rewire the solar panel using 3 Wires
reward: 1x Extended Shotgun Mag II 1x Extended Medium Mag II

name: Flickering Threat
objective: Enter the Power Generation Complex by The Dam Find the Generator Room Repair the Generator Find the Ventilation Shaft Enable the power via the power switch underneath the stairs
reward: Radio Renegade Outfit (Helmet Variant) 5x Medium Gun Parts 3x Advanced Mechanical Components

name: Greasing Her Palms
objective: On Spaceport, scope out the rocket thrusters outside the Rocket Assembly On Dam Battlegrounds, visit the Locked Room in the Water Treatment Control building On Buried City, visit the barricaded area on floor 6 of the Space Travel Building
reward: Lure Grenade Blueprint Speaker Component Electrical Components

name: Hatch Repairs
objective: Repair the leaking hydraulic pipes near a Raider Hatch Search for a Hatch Key near the Raider Hatch
reward: 1x Raider Hatch Key 1x Binoculars

name: Industrial Espionage
objective: Find Tian Wen's weapon cache near the Gas Station in the Outskirts Deliver the Burletta to the rival weapon cache Plant a bug on the weapon cache
reward: Burletta Blueprint 3x Mechanical Components 3x Simple Gun Parts

name: Keeping The Memory
objective: In One Round Reach the wreckage in the Formicai Hills Search for the missing helmet Return the helmet to the memorial
reward: 5x Simple Gun Parts 5x Duct Tape 5x Magnet

name: Lost In Transmission
objective: In One Round Visit Control Tower A6 Reach the top of Control Tower A6 Establish a connection from the terminal
reward: Snap Hook

name: Marked For Death
objective: Reach the Su Durante Warehouses in the Outskirts in Buried City Search for Tian Wen's cache near the Warehouses Follow the clues
reward: Shotgun Choke II Angled Grip II

name: Medical Merchandise
objective: On Spaceport, search 2 containers in the Departure Building's exam rooms Search 3 containers in the Hospital in Buried City On Dam Battlegrounds, search 2 containers in the Research & Administration building's medical room
reward: Backpack Charm (Banana) 3x Defibrillator 2x Vita Shot

name: Mixed Signals
objective: Destroy an ARC Surveyor Obtain 1 Surveyor Vault
reward: Photoelectric Cloak Raider Hatch Key

name: Our Presence Up There
objective: In One Round Visit the Pattern House in The Dam Find and flip the power switch Complete the antenna installation on the roof
reward: Buried City Town Hall Key Raider Hatch Key 3x Jolt Mine

name: Out Of The Shadows
objective: Destroy a Rocketeer Obtain a Rocketeer Driver
reward: 3x Surge Shield Recharger 2x Wolfpack

name: Prescriptions Of The Past
objective: In One Round Visit the Departure Building in Spaceport Find the Medical Exam Room inside the Departure Building Search for the records
reward: Heavy Shield Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing) 3x Adrenaline Shot

name: Safe Passage
objective: Destroy 2 ARC enemies using any explosive grenade
reward: 5x Li'l Smoke Grenade 3x Shrapnel Grenade 3x Barricade Kit

name: Source Of The Contamination
objective: Reach the Water Treatment Building in The Dam Search for the Flood Spill Intake near the Swamp Investigate any suspicious objects
reward: 5x Steel Spring 5x Duct Tape 1x Mod Components

name: Sparks Fly
objective: Destroy a Hornet with a Trigger 'Nade or Snap Blast Grenade
reward: 4x Crude Explosives 2x Processor Trigger 'Nade Blueprint

name: Straight Record
objective: Reach Victory Ridge Find the old EMP trap Disable the first power switch Disable the second power switch Disable the third power switch Shut down the EMP trap
reward: 5x Medium Gun Parts 3x Advanced Mechanical Components

name: Switching The Supply
objective: In One Round Find the tunnels under the Spaceport Find and turn the valve in the tunnels under Spaceport
reward: Radio Renegade Outfit (Blue Color) Spaceport Trench Tower Key 3x Synthesized Fuel

name: The Right Tool
objective: Destroy a Fireball Destroy a Hornet Destroy a Turret
reward: Cheer Emote 1x Stitcher II 1x Extended Light Mag I

name: The Root Of The Matter
objective: In One Round Go to the Research Building Search for the seed vault in the "room with a great view" Deliver the Experimental Seed Sample to Celeste
reward: Backpack Charm (Succulent) 1,000.mw-parser-output .template-price{display:flex;gap:1px;align-items:center;width:min-content}

name: The Major's Footlocker
objective: In One Round Search for Major Aiva's mementos in the apartments northwest of The Dam Deliver Major Aiva's Mementos to Tian Wen
reward: Hullcracker Blueprint

name: The Trifecta
objective: Destroy a Wasp Get a Wasp Driver for Shani Destroy a Hornet Get a Hornet Driver for Shani Destroy a Snitch Get a Snitch Scanner for Shani
reward: Origin Outfit (Orange Camo Color) 1x Raider Hatch Key 2x Defibrillator 1x Dam Control Tower Key

name: Tribute to Toledo
objective: Get a Power Rod for Celeste
reward: Dam Staff Room Key

name: Unexpected Initiative
objective: In One Round Reach the Grandioso Apartments in Buried City Search for Fertilizer on the rooftop of the Grandioso Apartments Reach Piazza Roma in Buried City Search for a Water Pump in the broken rooftop gardens at Piazza Roma Deliver a Water Pump to Tian Wen Deliver Fertilizer to Tian Wen
reward: Il Toro I 40x Shotgun Ammo Shotgun Choke II

name: Untended Garden
objective: In One Round Go to the Hydroponic Dome Complex Access the data archive in one of the domes Upload the data to the computer terminal in any Field Depot
reward: 3x Advanced Mechanical Components 3x Heavy Gun Parts 5x Canister

name: Water Troubles
objective: In One Round Locate the Flood Access Tunnel under the Red Lake Balcony Find the intake to the District's Water Supply
reward: 3x Mechanical Components 3x Simple Gun Parts 3x Steel Spring

name: What Goes Around
objective: Destroy any ARC using a Fireball Burner
reward: Backpack Attachment (Cans) 3x Blaze Grenade 2x Noisemaker

name: What We Left Behind
objective: On Buried City, search 2 containers in the Raider Camp beneath the Parking Garage On Dam Battlegrounds, search for anything significant in the South Swamp Outpost On Spaceport, search for anything significant in Bilguun's Hideout, next to the Container Storage
reward: Muzzle Brake II Vertical Grip II Stable Stock II

name: Paving The Way
requiredLocation: Dam Battlegrounds, Blue Gate, Buried City
objective: Go to any ENELICA building Search for a notice board with a note from the researcher On Buried City, reach the top floor above the Convinio in Piazza Roma Find the researcher's flat and search for any research data
reward: 1x Raider Hatch Key 3x Seeker Grenade 1x Advanced Electrical Components

name: Deciphering The Data
objective: Use the Magnetic Decryptor in the Fuel Control Building Reach the Arrival Building in Spaceport Use the Magnetic Decryptor on the top floor of the Arrival Building
reward: 3x Defibrillator 3x Trailblazer

name: Groundbreaking
objective: Enter the locked room at Pilgrim's Peak Search the room for any construction research Find the building pictured on the whiteboard Photograph the abounded housing project
reward: Warden Outfit (Tangerine Color) 1x Power Rod

name: A Toxic Trail
objective: Return to the water intake below the Water Treatment Control building Search the swamp for traces of the barrel's origins Take a photo of the barrel truck Search the trunk for clues about the saboteur's identity
reward: 1x Tactical Mk. 2 3x Zipline 3x Pulse Mine 3x Gas Mine

name: The Stench Of Corruption
objective: In One Round Reach the southwest lobby of the Departure Building Find the staff locker room Search the room for any clues of the saboteur's identity Reach the tunnels below the Spaceport Use the key on any Flushing Terminal to override the bypass protocol
reward: Warden Outfit (Blue Color) 1x Air Freshener 1x Dam Staff Room Key 3x Noisemaker

name: The Clean Dream
objective: On spaceport, search 4 containers in the underground tunnels Find and monitor any Filtration System in the tunnels On The Blue Gate, visit the Maintenance Bunker Monitor the Purification System in the bunker Find and photograph the blueprints in the bunker
reward: 1x Deadline 3x Showstopper 3x Heavy Fuze Grenade

name: A First Foothold
objective: Nail down the roof plates on the Raider structure near Trapper's Glade Stabilize the observation deck near the Ridgeline Enable the comms terminal near the Olive Grove Rotate the satellite dishes on the church roof, north of the Data Vault
reward: 3x Shrapnel Grenade 3x Snap Blast Grenade 3x Heavy Fuze Grenade

name: Reduced To Rubble
objective: Take a photo of the collapsed Highway Go to the Broken Earth Follow the trail of destruction though the Broken Earth Investigate the unknown ARC machines
reward: 1x Zipline 3x Barricade Kit 3x Door Blocker

name: With A Trace
objective: Reach the Barren Clearing Find signs of who brought down the ARC machines Inspect the Adorned Wreckage Inspect the communications device
reward: 1x Looting Mk. 2 1x Medium Shield
